website_summaries.verdict: These corrective glasses have the appearance of deep-red sunglasses, but the power to change the quality of life for colorblind wearers. Best suited for short-term outdoor use, similar to regular sunglasses.
pros: Lightweight frames, very comfortable to wear
Enhances very subtle colors, such as pink
Improves blues, not just reds and greens
cons: Seller may be soliciting positive reviews

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! Seller is paying each customer $20 in exchange for positive reviews.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews, I was excited to gift these glasses to my friend. Upon opening the package, I received a note that offers to gift $20 in exchange for a positive review. I'm very disappointed to see that Golden Mermaid/ Pilestone (it appears they are the same entity) is paying $20 for each positive review that they receive. These glasses are a scam.
customer_reviews.author: June Lee

customer_reviews.title: They definitely work. They give everything a sort of ...
customer_reviews.text: They definitely work. They give everything a sort of rosy tint, but many colors look very different with these on while some other colors remain essentially the same. I'm not so colorblind that I see in black and white (and therefore I didn't weep in sublime ecstasy when I first put these on), but I can only see 20% of the numbers in a standard colorblindness test. With these on I see 85%. I keep taking them on and off and marveling at the difference. It's the fact that only certain colors are affected and so dramatically so that makes them seem so darned magical. How the hell do these things work anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These glasses actually work. I have never been able to take a color blind test of the circles and see much of anythiong before, especially the green and red. I could see almost all of the numbers and shapes with these on and very few without them The ones I could see without them were very hard to see, but stood out clearly with the glasses on. They are not perfect, but they do work I was not expecting it. Colors are much brighter also.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: These glasses gave my husband new lenses for life
customer_reviews.text: I'd never heard of these kinds of lenses. Planned a surprise for my color blind husband. He opened this gift in our daughter's apartment that was poorly lit. He didn't have much of a response then. BUT when we went outside he kept taking glasses on and off. And wears them almost constantly. This may sound strange but he seems to see life differently. Not kidding. Not sure if it's a coincidence. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Princess Percussionist

customer_reviews.title: Do not correct CVD.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses do not correct color blindness. They change red to orange and green to a gray. Interestingly, they change turquoise to a dark purple as verified by people with normal color vision. I have moderate to strong protanomaly and have found that Enchroma glasses help me a bit by boosting saturation and enhancing greens and some reds without tinting everything else. I will say that these GM-2 glasses did help me pass an ishihara color blindness test by changing the colors completely. I would caution you in believing the reviews for these glasses because they're offering everybody who writes a review $20 in cash.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: You have nothing to lose, BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I can not rave about these glasses enough. I got them for my 64 year-old dad who is red-green deficient and seeing the world through these glasses brought tears to his eyes. Just like other reviews, he said things like, "That's what Blue looks like?!" or "Wow, that's actually red? I thought that was just a dull brown!" He was astounded by the vibrance and contrast he could now see. He felt so overwhelmed at how beautiful the world around him actually looked, he couldn't stop talking about it for days. These glasses are so worth it. This world is full of beautiful things to see so don't deprive yourself or loved ones any longer!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: They do work!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were purchased for my son who has been colorblind for 50 years. He is now able to see colors he never saw before. I would definitely recommend these glasses. The price is very affordable compared to other colorblind glasses. I enjoy watching his face as colors in the world around him come to life. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Chernesky

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but a cheap fix for a colorblind child ...
customer_reviews.text: Child missed 12 on color blind test without, 5 with. Not perfect, but a cheap fix for a colorblind child to be able to see the world differently.
customer_reviews.author: grandiloquious

customer_reviews.title: Truthfully, I am not sure what I'm supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully, I am not sure what I'm supposed to see but everything is much brighter and more discriminating. I am red-green color-blind and always mixing colors up and could never pass a color blind test. I recently saw a full rainbow and instead of just two colors I saw a lot of colors. Now my problem is I don't know what their names are. I can tell they're different shades of red and green and purples. But since I've never seen them before I have to keep asking my wife what color is that? And yes I can pass the color blind test now without missing any.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: I can see red
customer_reviews.text: I received the glasses today and it was amazing to see what red actually looks like. I could see purple for the first time and I was able to discern green from red or brown. It even made blue stand out better for me. I always knew stop signs were red but I did not realize how red they were. It is definitely worth trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! These totally work!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have got these sooner. The world is so much brighter! I never knew how dull the world was before these. After 40 plus years I can see the world like a normal person. It truly is a whole new world for me! I can pass color blind tests now. I didn't get them all, but I can see so many more. The only downside is I have to learn colors. Thank you for such an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Y

customer_reviews.title: They don't work
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when my husband opened these on Christmas morning and they didn't work. Not even a little bit. He said they just made everything appear red in color. He was diagnosed as red/green colorblind as a child, and these glasses are advertised to correct that. I meant to return them but never got around to it.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Dog Lady

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves his glasses. At Disney he was able to see many colors. He says they allow him to see more shades of green and distinguish more easily between green and browns (he's mild protanopia red/green). He used the glasses for the color blindness test and passed 100%. So worth it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Perry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome experience at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! My dad is red/green color-blind and had mentioned that not being able to see all the colors was one of the few things he regretted about his life situation. Other brands of color-corrective lenses are prohibitively expensive - $200+. I found these on Amazon and were encouraged by the reviews. When my dad first tried them on he just quietly looked around for a while - he couldn't get over how "bright" strong reds were (too him they had always looked like a dull brownish-red). He even looked at a bottle of ketchup for a full minute - everything was new! I'm happy he can have this experience, and I'm happy that these weren't a budget-breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my son who has red/green color blindness. They are not true color blind corrective glasses, they really just turn everything pink. Returned them for refund.
customer_reviews.author: It's a zoo

customer_reviews.title: Thankyou for creating affordable colorblind glasses that really work !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work great for my 7 yr old. He can see and tell difference between orange, red, green and browns with these on. Affordable and nice case. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Pink Toy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my red/green colorblind husband, really excited that he would be able to finally see more of the beautiful colors I enjoy and specifically what red and green actually look like. The first, and only time he put them on he said "everything looks maroon" - which is actually funny, since he wouldn't know maroon from lavender. All that aside, these glasses do not do what they are advertised to do, and it was a waste of 65 dollars. :(
customer_reviews.author: Shelley M Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!!! So happy!!!! Our 3rd order.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is red-green colorblind and this is the 3 rd pair I've ordered him. The first time he put them on it was like watching a baby see colors for the first time. We were emotional because everything looked so different to him. He could finally see our daughters eye colors and a true sunset. He loves these glasses. This is our 3rd order because he's a bit of a roughneck and a clumsy man so that's why we ordered again but definitely worth every penny. Even 3 pair these glasses still beat buying one of the name brand glasses. So happy I found this company on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They did not work and there is not an option to return the glasses for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: clotheschic

customer_reviews.title: Thank God you can return these. I was hopeful though.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Gave these to my friend who can't see red/green. He is color blind. I had such high hopes for these glasses, but he said everything just looked red, so green stuff now looked brown. Blue things were now purple. It was like looking through a red shaded pair of glasses. It was just no bueno. Ended up sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: blove2205

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both pair to see if they worked for the color-blind men in my life (husband, brother-in-law and grandson) and all were disappointed to find that these were just glasses with blue plastic lens and the other red plastic lens. How stupid do they think we are? When I returned them, I was met with resistances regarding the refund until I told them that Amazon will hear about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apparently my red green color perception did not respond to ...
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my red green color perception did not respond to these glasses; everything was very pink and some shades of yellow and orange appeared the same. What was more disturbing wasthe printed request that if you not helped DON'T tell Amazon send us an Email and wee will refund you directly.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 16 year old son.From the moment he put them on he was speechless and then tears.From which I received the most sincere hug I've ever had. The depth of colors he described that he can see in flowers,trees and video games made me tear up. I'm soooo happy for him and I should of ordered sooner...PTL!
customer_reviews.author: MRDARKHELMET

customer_reviews.title: Some colors really pop out!
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with red green colorblindness most of my life. These glasses enable me to see some colors quite a bit more vividly. The yellows and blues really pop out, and for the first time in my life it's easy to differentiate yellows from oranges, and oranges from reds. The only drawback I see is that the colored lenses do tend to put a slight pinkish tint to things. However, being able to differentiate colors I couldn't tell apart before is well worth "seeing the world through rose colored glasses".
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good for a purpose
customer_reviews.text: Pretty interesting, they didn’t quite work for me. However, I could pass a colorblind test, so it would say I had normal color vision. But with my color blindness everything that was bluish green (to other people) was just blue with these glasses on and red was orange. If you are using these to pass a color blind test or maybe differentiate colors then five stars. But for me, it didn’t help me see true colors.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: SORT OF WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I'm green/red color blind and after seeing all the videos online of people crying after wearing similar glasses, I figured I must really be missing out on what things really looked like. I could see colorblind tests after putting the glasses on, which was interesting...but everything else looked terrible with a red tint to it.... red was a little more red and green was a little more green. I didn't cry. Plus they didn't fit my big head.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old nephew who is color blind. The moment he put them on the green grass was no longer brownish it's now green. He wants to wear them all the time because he sees thing now as they are suppose to be. Great product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: 13 year old son loves these
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for these for his 13th birthday. He was so excited when they came. At first he saw the pink tint in most things. He wasn't sure they were working. He decided to go the website to check the color blind wheels that he originally looked at to see if these glasses might work for him. He was thrilled that all of a sudden he could see most of the numbers -- he is also blue/green color blind. He could then appreciate what he was seeing with the glasses on. He has had the glasses for a week now and has worn them every day since. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Joy Labott

customer_reviews.title: just a notch filter, nothing fancy, but should work for some (I'm not colour blind, I'm doing optics work)
customer_reviews.text: i was hoping for more than just an attenuation centered where our red&green cones overlap (in freq). i thought these would be a band stop filter with 3 notches, allowing the bluest-blue/greenest-green/redest-red to pass through (which would be an impressive passive filter!) but alas, they went tbe cheap route.. still giving 4 stars since it would help some colour blind people, but fails for my own scientific needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These are really good. My ex husband is color blind got them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. My ex husband is color blind got them for him. He states makes colors more vivid. He told me he was red , green but apparently he is brown also they work good for him but would have been better if he said he was brown also. This of course is not the company's fault but ours . He likes them well enough he is keeping them
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! Brought my 20 year old son to tears..... I will warn you though that the recipient should be prepared for the changes that they will see. My son was confused and a bit sad for a bit because these are not designed to be worn 24/7. They tend to cast a reddish hue.
customer_reviews.author: dawn2teach

customer_reviews.title: It works as described.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a month ago and I have been using it frequently to see colors when I need/want. I have a red-green color deficiency as long as I remember. Based on my experience with this item, color of green becomes so vivid. I assume, this is an indication that my naked-eye green sensor is weak. It was a good experience. I wish this product becomes available like regular prescription glasses so that people with color deficiency can enjoy their life with colors.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Even my father also did not feel different at all I made bad purchase I don't advice anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.text: 1-Very cheap product. 2- I tried it and no different at all. Even my father also did not feel different at all I made bad purchase I don't advice anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Jehad Mazen Gazalh

customer_reviews.title: My son went from sever to normal on color blind test
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 14 year old with red/green color blind. Did these change his life? No. Did he have a crying, tear jerk reaction when wearing them? No. But he did go from scoring severe to normal on a color blind test so they do work. He does not like the fact that everything is tinted pink and that becomes a little overwhelming for him but they do work. Does he look like Cyclops/Ray Orbison? Yes. But like others have said these are a fraction of the cost of other glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter for her High School graduation. We did not find out that she was Red/Green color blind until the end of her senior year. I bought her a dozen Red roses and a cookie cake with tons of Red icing. When she put the glasses on, she pulled apart the petals thinking they were fake, or that the "real color" that she was used to would be inside. When she realized she was seeing Red for the first time, she screamed in joy. It was a beautiful moment I will never forget :)
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend was very satisfied with these glasses and i gave you five stars ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was very satisfied with these glasses and i gave you five stars cause it worked wonderfully for him he told me he was very very very happy he can see the colors red and blue and many more colors that he is now seeing for the very first time i am very glad that these glasses work for him..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: We put these in my son's stocking, and when he found out what they were he brought up a color blind test on his phone. He failed the test without the glasses, but with the glasses on he got 100%. My father was there too who is color blind, and he was also able to pass the test with the glasses on. I don't know how they compare to the glasses that cost hundreds of dollars, but for the money we spent, it was a great deal! I can't wait until spring when he can see all the flowers blooming!
customer_reviews.author: GaryL

customer_reviews.title: Friend Weeps from Life Altering Experience
customer_reviews.text: I overheard one of my co-workers having to explain to customers being color blind. After reading a news article of these glasses bringing a man to tears from the experience, I had to see if they would help my friend. They worked. He began weeping from seeing color for the first time in 30+ years. Thanks to Pilestone for giving me the chance to be part of changing someone's life!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for a Color blind cousin. He's almost 40 and it was his 1st daughter's christening party. When I told him what they are he got so excited. He ran around with them for an hour exclaiming how amazed he was that he could see red for the 1st time. The only downside is that it distort some colors. But with other glasses being over $300 these are truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen young

customer_reviews.title: Take the online test for specific colorblindness before ordering
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these glasses as a gift for my father in law. We didn’t do research on the type of colorblindness he had and were disappointed they didn’t work for his type...that being said, they worked perfect for my father in laws brother who was also colorblind. He thought they were awesome! But father in law wished to return them since he couldn’t use them, I contacted Ben who was Fantastisc. He helped us pick a different pair of glasses that worked for him and even offered contacts as well as refund if they didn’t work. Constomer service was fast and reliable and product was great! 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly guardino

customer_reviews.title: These glasses have already improved my life!
customer_reviews.text: I know it works because I passed the color blind test while wearing the glasses -- I am a moderate to strong deutan without the glasses. Also, before I received the glasses, I recently watched Manchester United play Barcelona -- Man U were wearing light grey kits and Barca wore light blue, and it was hard for me to tell the difference between the teams on the field. I later watched the highlights after I received the glasses, and I couldn't believe the difference in color between the uniforms -- I had no problem distinguishing between the teams! The glasses will definitely be useful for situations like those and for when I need to look at colored diagrams for work.
customer_reviews.author: jowachi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of effort, should get penalty for creating trash
customer_reviews.text: Awful product, made everything pink, seller offers $20 for good review, I cant believe someone would give it more the one * I would make them pay because they destroy our nature by creating wastful products!
customer_reviews.author: ili

customer_reviews.title: They work for me!
customer_reviews.text: They work for me, really brings out colors I couldn't see. Before purchase, I took the color blind test online. It indicated a strong Deutan .(red/green color blindness) I retook the test with these glasses and test result was inconclusive this time. There were several I still couldn't see, but a lot more that I could. They may not work for everyone, but worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Burch

customer_reviews.title: 😎He said all this time he's been missing out on so many colors I was very pleased so we'll see thank you so much and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses for my son he was not expecting them ,I had all the colors of the ballrooms 🎈in his room ...he put the glasses on! 😎He said all this time he's been missing out on so many colors I was very pleased so we'll see thank you so much and the glasses they were actually very nice to my surprise
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN J BATEMAN

customer_reviews.title: OMG wow....
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and tried many brands and types including the very expensive Chroma and these were the ones that "did it" for me. The others did nothing. It was a night and day difference! For others looking don't get discouraged try as many as you can, because everyone is different. I am very pleased with the quality and the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime jones

customer_reviews.title: They actually work
customer_reviews.text: They actually work for my husband. He is red-green color-blind. However, keep in mind that it’s very strong emotional change for someone who could not see colors before. Work into glasses slowly, do not wear them into the store, city or other places with aggressive colors. Start getting used to them in the nature. It can be very overwhelmjng
customer_reviews.author: BlueSage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dad is now able to see colors he has never seen before.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Umm I can now pass the colorblind tests! So weird. Colors are so much brighter than before. Very cute case too.
customer_reviews.author: Polina Stolyar

customer_reviews.title: Actually works! My father in law is so excited!
customer_reviews.text: Great!! I have to admit, I was a bit skeptical but ordered anyway. My father in law is colorblind and has wanted to try colorblind glasses for a long time. We ordered these for his birthday and they were a huge hit! I showed him a colorblind test on my phone and without the glasses, he could not see the hidden numbers. With the glasses, much to his amazement and delight, he could see the numbers! He immediately ordered a pair for his brother in Japan who is also colorblind!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product for those who don't want to spend the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to see the world as others do and I thought this would help me. It does work and I see most of the colors that I usually don't see. The only problem is that it turns everything that doesn't have red in it a shade of red. So it doesn't really shade out the colors that don't need red in it to give you a full idea about how normal people see color. It is a great product for those who don't want to spend the big bucks though. P.S. the world is truely beautiful and not all sickly green like I see it!
customer_reviews.author: Customer55

customer_reviews.title: They Work!!! gave them to my step-dad ...
customer_reviews.text: They Work!!! gave them to my step-dad for birthday and he was surprised. However they do not work well indoors and if they have to wear perscription glasses it is hard for them to see without their other glasses if they are wearing these. However he was very excited about seeing red for his very first time (he is 72 years old)
customer_reviews.author: Cheyren

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. I admit I was skeptical. But decided to get them based on the reviews and for the Fall foliage. Boy was I was shocked to see how vivid the leaves were. Also as an aside I never realized how blue my swimming pool was. Highly recommend these if you are red-green color blind like me.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for step father. He was really happy about them. Said he was finally able to see the difference in shades of purple and blue with them as well as the red in my mother’s hair he had usually seen as just a dark color. Packaging was good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Adams

customer_reviews.title: Red/Green Deutan
customer_reviews.text: I found Pilestone red-green glasses works great for me. These glasses make reds brighter and easier to see. I was able to see green color okay. I did a color blindness test on my computer. Results: With Pilestone red/green glasses: Correct Color Vision. The results speak for it's self. I highly recommend at least trying these glasses if you are red/green deutan.
customer_reviews.author: T Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works to help with Red Green color blindness
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these glasses and taking a color blind test proves to me that they improve your ability to differentiate color better. One thing I did discover, they work much better when you have them in front of corrective glasses. I wish I had a clip on version, so I could wear them with glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Really neat
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift. He tried glasses in the past but his eyes would always readjust but not with these. He’s severely color blind (reds blues greens) but these glasses helped with the red and blue aspect. And like others he has a very positive emotional response. Gave them in fall so he could see the leaves. The company did request a good review but upon using the glasses it’s hard not to do so. My friend really enjoys them
customer_reviews.author: easmith9140

customer_reviews.title: These are truly fantastic! It's nice to know that
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen the variety of colors in nature since I have red/green colorblindness. Using these glasses, I'm, for the first time, able to see the wide range of colors in nature. I'm an avid gardener and I'm able to see the result of my years of effort. These are truly fantastic! It's nice to know that, as a senior citizen, I'm able to still get enthusiastic over a change in my life. Mark Rothenberg
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rothenberg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and transforming
customer_reviews.text: They are a dark red! They worked. My dad has always asked us to help him pick out matching clothes for work. Do these socks match? He's even questioned decor and how I dress my daughter. Lol He is overwhelmed. Not everything was impacted but, I imagine not everything is. It was a huge response! GM-2 Thank you for the perfect Father's Day gift!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Yoakum

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Works. Period.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work!!! Plain and simple. They are made for red and green colorblindness. And the company that makes them, Pilestone, are fantastic and if there product doesn't work they will work with you till you get those desired results. I should've recorded the reaction of my father when I gave them to him. I was too busy crying with him because he could finally see the flowers in the garden he planted in their natural colors.
customer_reviews.author: Logan yost

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother has red/green color blindness. We confirmed this when he exclaimed, "There are two colors here! I though it was all the same!!"...lol... I'm very happy for him, this is the first time he's seeing the difference and now he's running around like an excited puppy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works so well!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My adult son has been dealing with color blindness all his life. When he got these glasses he was not without some doubt as to their efficacy. He was BLOWN AWAY with how well they work!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good Feeling
customer_reviews.text: I got these glasses for a friend. He said that he almost cried. For the first time in his life he could see the colors of the pedestrian cross lights. These glasses have changed the way he will be able to see, and I am sooooo glad to be able to have gotten them for him. It is a life changing event allowed by this item. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Trylon

customer_reviews.title: I am red / green color blind and the glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: I am red / green color blind and the glasses definitely made green appear much more green. At first it wasn't very apparent when putting them on, but then I looked at the WhatsApp icon on my phone and wow! It was true green! When I had my wife try looking at the same thing (she is not color blind), she said the glasses made the icon look less green ... it was almost too dark to be green! Overall, I'd say they work to an extent. I was able to make out a few more numbers in the color blind tests than I could with my naked eye. For the price point, I'd say they were worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it might be more of a novelty thing that was fun for the party
customer_reviews.text: Present for my Dad's 70th birthday. He is red/green color blind. I thought it might be more of a novelty thing that was fun for the party. But he LOVES them. Everything does have a slightly red tint, but he believes it very clearly works. He said a shirt he always thought was green now is clearly red - and he was right! He's now asking me to find a clip-on version he can wear with his glasses! Definitely worth a shot for someone red-green color blind. My son is and I'll be getting some for him once he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my 8 year old son. He loves them. He said it made everything he sees brighter and allowed him to finally see the numbers we could see in the color blind tests. Really cool. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is color blind. He cannot see red or green. I wanted to give him a life changing Christmas gift. I couldn't wait for him to unwrap his present. He never knew there were glasses like this. It was very emotional. Seeing red and green is crucial in his line of work. He is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. Lefevre

customer_reviews.title: I believe I am a moderate protan. I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe I am a moderate protan. I bought these with skepticism but hope due to the positive reviews. I put them on and thought they only tinted everything red or what I thought was red at first. I went for a drive and I started seeing fire hydrants popping out. I never noticed them before and it's the road I live on. I started noticing flowers and different building colors. Green traffic lights all of a sudden don't just blend in with every other white light anymore. I don't know if they make me see the correct color but they certainly do something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Not a Fan of Fall...Baby Steps
customer_reviews.text: I am still in disbelief, but they did work for my needs. I saw fall colors for the first time. Never realized I would enjoy any part of Fall, but seeing the changing leaves was a small dream of mine. The leaves normally look green or brown without glasses, with them, a new world was shown to me. Especially sumac, burning bushes, and maple🍁 trees. Had others verify the colors I was seeing; I must have sounded like a child learning colors, shapes and animals. 4 stars due to my left lens popping out sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Father's Day. He tried the standard color blind test online and passed. He said things do have a strange tint to them but he's seeing colors properly for the first time in his life. We're definitely keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Derry B.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting colors now.
customer_reviews.text: Holy Unicorn!!! She said, My daughter wants to see everything again. Her greens used to be gray. Most colors changed in appearance. She wears them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: UPS GUY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our adult son's birthday. He did not seem impressed until he put them on. He stared out the window and tears appeared in his eyes. He went outside and marveled at the new world of color that available to him now. He hugged us and said it was the best present anyone ever gave him.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us unfortunately :(
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately this did not work for my father in law OR my neighbor. Both have color blind issues - red and brown and this just make everything look red unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I have ever given a friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend who is color blind. He seems to have the kind that can be greatly improved with these glasses. It was a very emotional moment that brought him nearly to tears.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Excellant!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Son and 2 Grandsons that are colorblind so I purchased a pair and they were all really excited. They said the colors were amazing! They had to get used to the red tint on whites and pale colors but the greens and reds were so bright. It made a big difference. Thanks for making an affordable option! Time to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me much at all
customer_reviews.text: The glasses came in just one style and for the most part didn't help me see any of the items in color blind test charts.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy 2 U

customer_reviews.title: That rose is so  red!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has spent his 63 years on Earth with red-green colorblindness. When he put them on, he was in awe and couldn't believe how green the grass and leaves are. He was fascinated with how red the roses that he's been growing are. It was beautiful to watch him experience these things for the first time. Thank you for your product that is both affordable and truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Linberger

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the glasses - have ordered 2 pair
customer_reviews.text: I gave the glasses to my grandson for his 15th birthday. He is an artist and can now see colors he did not see before. He is very pleased with the result as am I. Thank you so much for this product! This is a second review. I am very happy with your colorblind glasses. Both my grandsons are colorblind. I got the glasses for the 15 year old and he loves them. The 21 year old wants a pair too after trying his brother’s. He thinks they are great. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and now can't return!! Money wasted!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses didn't work for my husband. He does have red-green colorblindness. He has tried them several times since we bought them over the past month. When I bought the glasses it said we could return within 60 days and now it says 30 days was the cut off! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my color blind husband. Actually made his vision worse. Could no longer see the green light on traffic signals.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Good but more depends on your type of vision.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are dependent entirely on how bad your color vision is and what type. Do not expect a magic elixir. I received them today and tested them. I will primarily use them to identify colored strands on network wire. Some colors are clearer and more defined others are not. With these glasses I can identify clearly some wires and then look below them to identify the other wires. They will serve their purpose. I did pass a color blind test with them on but it took a lot longer than a normal vision would have. Without them no way. I rate their helpfulness with me about 70%. So I will keep them. They help me work.
customer_reviews.author: philandcandice

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied! I bought these for my husband. He's 64 & has never seen any colors except brown. He put these glasses on & could see reds very good. Greens not so much. He was still ecstatic! He said the colors he couldn't see were still brighter. I asked him if he wanted to return them. No way he said. He kept putting them on, taking them off. He was just amazed that he could see colors at all. And the price at of $64 can't be beat. The quality of the glasses are very good also.
customer_reviews.author: George Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been told that I am red-green colorblind, these did not help at all. They comletly block green arrows and green lights on street signal lights. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: David M. Mallett

customer_reviews.title: My husband can see shades of color he's never seen before!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were a gift for my husband. He is red/green colorblind. When he first put them on, there wasn't much difference. After a few minutes, his color vision changed. He could see all the shades of brown and green in the grass and trees, the red combs on our chickens, the colors in our clothes. It was a huge moment!! These glasses are WAY more affordable than some other colorblind glasses and work for my husband. The reason I chose these was the fact that this company was honest with their description and offer an affordable product. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: They worked great for him and he enjoys them very much
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased some of your color blind corrective glasses for my 9 year old son who is red-green color-blind. Didn't wait till Christmas for him to unwrap them, I let him have them as soon as they were delivered. The rest of that day was an Adventure full of new colors that he was seeing for the first time. They worked great for him and he enjoys them very much. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not work
customer_reviews.text: Service was quick and return was easy. Three colorblind family members tried glasses! Do not work. Everything was pink, even white items. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: sharon kanoski

customer_reviews.title: Red isn't dull anymore
customer_reviews.text: These make reds and oranges very vibrant. I have been red and green color blind my whole life and love seeing small things like the difference between blue and purple, how tail lights should really look, and the actual color of the cedar stain on my deck. They're amazing, but unfortunately there is no effect on the green spectrum for me. Still, worth the value and I loved having them during the autumn foliage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to first off thank you for this product. I can finally see how beautiful my wife's eyes truly are. These have been life changing. And to clarify another review, it's not 20 dollars for a positive review, it clearly states that IF these glasses help you, then write a review, it doesn't even say write a positive review, just a review, so to be upset about that is ridiculous...anyway thank you for giving me the gift of color, the world is even more beautiful than I could have imagined
customer_reviews.author: gabriel mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend and Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: We received the glasses today and our entire house was in tears as my 9 year old daughter, who saw red as yellow and blue and green as gray, put on the glasses and was excited to see green grass, trees, her brother's blue book bag and blue towels that she always thought were gray. Today is one of the happiest days of my life to watch my daughter so overcome with joy is priceless. Thank you for an incredible product.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: After 55 years of being colorblind, I understand what normal sighted people see for the first time! I now know I haven't ever been seeing reds as vibrantly as the rest of the world. When I put on these glasses, the reds of the world POP! Seeing the American flag as it was meant to be brought a tear to my eye. I can't wait to watch fireworks with these glasses on! I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend that anyone with red-green colorblindness give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: A whole new world
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my 12 year old grandson. He loves them!! They have helped him to see a whole new world. He has wore them every possible minute since he got them 5 days ago, even at school. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Tollison

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Hit bad eyes on top of his color blindness, including some Catterick issues. Still help enough to make them grateful for the thought
customer_reviews.author: Marie Kerg

customer_reviews.title: I had no clue as to the various shades of red and orange.
customer_reviews.text: Boy howdy. The glasses didn't change the green of tree leaves much, but it sure changes the reds, oranges and yellows. I can tell the difference on traffic lights big time. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laubscher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in September 2017. My wife and I went to the Catskills for vacation in October to see the changing of the leaves and WOW what a unbelievable experience I had. Being color blind I’ve never had the opportunity to enjoy the autumn foliage until now. Thanks for allowing me to see what I’ve never seen. These work awesome
customer_reviews.author: Anita Evans

customer_reviews.title: the look on his face was wonderful. Though it does not correct all of his ...
customer_reviews.text: Was astonished when I gave them to my son who is color blind, the look on his face was wonderful. Though it does not correct all of his color blindness it allowed him to distinquish colors he has never seen! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert H Brown

customer_reviews.title: he loved them. could finally see some colors that he ...
customer_reviews.text: My purchased them for my son, he loved them.could finally see some colors that he had never seen, hr broke the one arm on them and I ordered another pair, the quality of the frames could be better
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Martin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses for my dad for father's day. They arrived earlier than expected. I was skeptical while reading information about these because they said these particular glasses worked on 90% of people with the red/green color blindness. But they worked!! He tried them on and saw colors he's never seen before and loves them! Extremely happy with my order and the experience and I highly recommend them. They're definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced Dreck
customer_reviews.text: These red filter gel lenses are a JOKE. cheap dime store knock-offs. No science could be proven that these are anything more than simple red lenses in crappy frames they don't even look good. AVOID this product. $64 for WHAT?
customer_reviews.author: Tebbe

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and he's happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. They are good quality and he's happy with them. They don't fix all the colors for him but it does correct a lot. He now understands why it's called 'the little red wagon'. He always thought it was green.
customer_reviews.author: KevinJM

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These glasses really do work for someone who has red-green impairment. My father was able to see colors on a color-vision test that he could not see previously. He mentioned that it brought out a better contrast on other colors that he normally had difficulty seeing. Definitely recommend based on the price, and ability to return for refund if they are not the proper color corrective lenses needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! It woks!
customer_reviews.text: I was colorblind in my whole life and I didn't even know it until I became an adult. This glasses works 100% i tried the Ishihara color blind test without the glasses and it was horrible i was having a trouble seeing the number then I tried it again with these glasses on and it worked. I was reading the numbers like with a normal vision.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

product_meta.title: Fox News Reported: Golden Mermaid GM-2 Colorblind Glasses (Color Blind Glasses)
feature_bullets: Unisex. Helps Red Green Color Blind to tell the difference of these two colors
Free Glasses Case Included as a Gift

Please test yourself before purchasing. However, if it does not help, I will refund you smoothly (due to the nature of color blindness, certain group of people will not find this very helpful--BUT, the majority of red-green color blind customers liked this product!)
